messages.content:
[CONTEXT]
Age: 31
Time: Monday 6:30am
Location: Bedroom
Biometric: Exhausted
Social: Baby crying in nursery
Pattern: New parent

[QUERY]
How long have I been awake?
About 3 hours between feedings. Your partner can take the next one. Sleep when you can, even 20 minutes helps.

Age: 31
Time: Saturday 2pm
Location: Home
Biometric: Overwhelmed
Social: House is a mess, kids running around

One room. Just one. Set a 20-minute timer. Ignore everything else until that room is done. Momentum builds.
